base_text_titles.en: Mishneh Torah, Appraisals and Devoted Property

title: Kessef Mishneh on Mishneh Torah, Appraisals and Devoted Property
enDesc: The Kessef Mishneh is a commentary on Rambam’s Mishneh Torah, written by Joseph Karo. The work was published during his lifetime, in Venice, 1574–1575.
